lead_paragraph: LEEDS--Dalia, cherished Godmother to Claire, Leslie and Randy; lifelong best friend to Roy and Barbara Goodman and their families: your motherly warmth, caring, generous spirit, elegance, and many talents will be missed deeply and never forgotten! With heavy hearts we send our profound sympathies to Larry, Ashley, Tracy and their families. 1/3
